data.actual_result: The split second the scrolling is done and you hit your desired message, it scrolls you straight back down to the bottom
data.expected_result: You should be scrolled up to the desired message without it throwing you straight back down to the bottom.
data.short_description: Jumping to a message in DMs while someone talks in the voice call scrolls you back down
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a DM voice call - In said call jump to a message. (Either pin or through search) - While it's scrolling to the desired message have either of the parties talk. - Observe
